def_en: A region is a large area of land that is different from other areas of land, for example because it is one of the different parts of a country with its own customs and characteristics, or because it has a particular geographical feature.

def_cn: （首都以外的）各地区，外省
def_en: The regions are the parts of a country that are not the capital city and its surrounding area.
You can refer to a part of your body as a region.

def_cn: （指数量）差不多，在…左右，大约
def_en: You say in the region of to indicate that an amount that you are stating is approximate.
